CHECKS_NOT_OWNER: ❌  You are not on the `owners` class of RinBot, this incident has been logged.
CHECKS_NOT_ADMIN:
❌  You are not on the `admins` class of this guild, this incident has been logged.
If you are an admin however, use the command `/admins set` to get verified and added to the class.
CHECKS_NOT_GUILD: ❌  Moderation commands do not work on DMs
CHECKS_BLACKLISTED: ❌  You are blacklisted, this incident has been logged.
CHECKS_NOT_OWNER_LOG: {user} (ID: {user_id}) tried running a command of class owner on {guild} (ID: '{guild_id}'), but they are not in this class
CHECKS_NOT_ADMIN_LOG: {user} (ID: {user_id}) tried running a command of class admin on {guild} (ID: '{guild_id}'), but they are not in this class
CHECKS_NOT_GUILD_LOG: {user} (ID: {user_id}) tried running a moderation command, but they were in my DMs
CHECKS_BLACKLISTED_LOG: {user} (ID: {user_id}) tried running a command but they're blacklisted on {guild} (ID: '{guild_id}')
COMMAND_ON_COOLDOWN: Hold on! >~< You're going too fast! You can use this command again in {time}
USER_NO_PERMS: ❌  You don't have `{perms}` permissions, which are necessary to run this command.
BOT_NO_PERMS: ❌  I don't have `{perms}` permissions, which are necessary to run this command.
JAVA_NOT_FOUND: Java not found in your system, please install java 17 or higher, if you have java installed, make sure it is available in your system path.
INTERFACE_VIDEO_SELECT_PLACEHOLDER: Please select one or more results...
FN_DS_SHOP_NO_SHOP: Tried to get fortnite daily shop, but the API returned None

MODERATION_BAN_DESC: Bans a user from the server
